content: I don't have the ability to see or watch videos, but i can provide information about beyoncé's coachella performance. beyoncé's performance at the coachella valley music and arts festival in 2018 is widely regarded as one of the most iconic performances in recent music history. during her two-hour set, beyoncé paid tribute to black culture, incorporating references to historically black colleges and universities, step shows, and african dance. she performed a medley of her greatest hits, including "crazy in love," "formation," and "single ladies (put a ring on it)," as well as fan favorites like "drunk in love" and "run the world (girls)." the performance featured an elaborate stage design, a full marching band, and multiple costume changes, and it has been celebrated for its ambition, energy, and celebration of black excellence.
